title: Can't Connect To Chat
body:
I've been trying to connect, but ever since the update from last night I can't seem to connect to chat what so ever. I've tried disabling IP Helper, allowing the program through the firewall, repairing the files, and even running as an administrator. Nothing seems to be working for me. Please help and thank you in advance for your time.   

Screenshot:
https://i.gyazo.com/641cf4eb481c5ca175d53fb34f9930e4.jpg

replies.body: I had to restart my computer... not sure why that worked but it did.

I had the same issue so I posted a ticket and made a comment and everything, but no one said anything so I just kept waiting and hitting reconnect to chat every few minutes. It just worked for me a few minutes ago so I guess just waited out? It lasted for less than half an hour

The new patch recently rolled out, so there could be a few hiccups sometimes like using chat.  There could be other reasons like network issues, but the problem seems to have been resolved.  I'm glad to hear everything is okay now!
Yeah nevemind. I just don't get why it happened, but it's fixed? Still scary that it happened. {{item:3151}}
